title: EP12 Wolf Pack Hunting with Hanks
itunes:title: Wolf Pack Hunting with Hanks
description: Tom Hanks joins Dan to talk about his new Second World War naval-themed film “Greyhound”. This is an hour-long conversation with two fans of History geeking out over the past.” Show Notes:
